data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Gaibandha, Rangpur, Bangladesh a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gaibandha, Rangpur, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Gaibandha that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Gaibandha, Rangpur, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Gaibandha, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Rajput (Hindu traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Rajput (Hindu traditions) people.
Spirit, encourage the church in Gaibandha, Rangpur, Bangladesh to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 2,981 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Gaibandha.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 2,379,300 souls in Gaibandha and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

location.name: Gaibandha
location.people_groups_list: Nagar, Rayeen (Hindu traditions), Aguri, Rajwar, Paliya
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nagar (145,000), Rayeen (Hindu traditions) (5,300), Aguri (1,000), Rajwar (9,600), Paliya (121,000)
